/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars of various colors are parked neatly along the sides of the street, adding a vibrant splash of color to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, their lush green foliage contrasting beautifully with the clear blue sky above. Power lines crisscross above, creating a network of geometric patterns against the sky. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
